name: Philipp Jovanovic
content: Philipp Jovanovic My name is Philipp Jovanovic and I am a Professor of Information Security at the Information Security Research Group of the Computer Science Department at University College London (UCL). I am also a co-founder of the decentralized infrastructure company ZKV. My research interests and work are in applied cryptography, decentralized and distributed systems, cryptocurrencies, and privacy-enhancing technologies. Feel free to reach out if you would like to work with me or simply get in touch for whatever reason.
